refnamediv.refpurpose: Selects which matrix in the illuminated path should be edited.

refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: Selects which matrix in the illuminated path should be edited. A number may be specified with 0 being the topmost selection. A combination/member may be specified to indicate that the matrix in combination that corresponds to member is to be edited. This command is only useful in matrix edit mode at the point where the user is selecting which matrix in the illuminated path should be edited. It is used internally by MGED; the user should generally use the mouse to make this selection.

refsection.title: EXAMPLES
refsection.para: The example shows the use of the matpick command to select the matrix for editing in a particular region and group.

example.title: Select a matrix to be edited in a particular region and group.
example.para: Selects the matrix for region3 in group1 for editing.
